author: cbs8
title: Halloween Trick or Treat? How About "MEET"? ParanormalMingle.com™ Offers Spooky Opportunity
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE ParanormalMingle.com
Hot new dating site attracting the millennial crowd by the droves.
MIDDLE ISLAND, N.Y. , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Industry observers are convinced that the new free ParanormalMingle.com™ dating site is sure to become the place for singles to make a Halloween connection. They expect thousands to explore the weird "must-visit" free site at www.paranormalmingle.com .™
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151019/278477
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151019/278589
Not only do they expect Halloween traffic to be heavy, but feel it may very well become a permanent important rival to the big dating destinations. Say the site is edgy, interesting and unique enough to become major long-lasting attraction.
So what makes it so different?
To begin with, its "spokesman" is called The Gatekeeper™ (No place else in the dating industry do you find anything as unusual and daring as that). He is presented as a multi-purpose apparition that not only welcomes singles through his gates, but also distributes information and opinions via press releases.
His latest handout describes his domain as a place where men and women who question the unknown, ghosts, UFOs, life after death, vampires, and zombies, plus government conspiracy theories, can peruse, talk and date - The ultimate goal being to find their soul mates.
According to The Gatekeeper™, "Once you enter my world, you are transported to a destination where your opinions are shared, valued and broadened."
However, before visitors do that, they are first are confronted with a landing page featuring what sounds like funeral music and the voice of The Gatekeeper™ himself welcoming and beckoning visitors to become a free member by clicking on www.paranormalmingle.com ™.
Actually, the site may sound dark and foreboding, but according to The Gatekeeper™, "Yes, we are frightening. We are scary. But there is nothing about my domain that is contrary to any religion." He invites visitors to discover this for themselves. Even if it is just to satisfy their curiosity.
http://paranormalmingle.wix.com/supernaturalsoulmate?_ga=1.129579596.1517888894.1436170841
